item.title: About Us
item.description: Leafwing Studios is a fledgling Canadian indie games studio, founded in 2020 to make richer, more thoughtful games. Whether we’re making tabletop games or video games, we care about: more sustainable, equitable and sensible business models for game development better design and prototyping practices creating memorable, replayable experiences through emergent design You’ll catch us blogging about our projects, game design, Rust, Bevy and better ways to create and collaborate.
